oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sevierville postcard 1940 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: RPPC. Note on back: ' Sevierville, Tenn. August 1940. Washed out the R.R. Tracks by Effie's house'. Shows railroad tracks partially underwater; utility poles in flood waters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Floods; Railroad tracks;
